anya-e0811n0:6: Saraṇaṃ pāṇinaṃ vāṇī, mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ manaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:10: Tathāpi tu vaḷañjenti, suddhamāgadhikā na te.
anya-e0811n0:19: Kiṃ tehi pādasussūsā, yesaṃ natthi garūni’ha;
anya-e0811n0:26: Yena tosenti viññū ye, tattha pya’vihitā’darā.
anya-e0811n0:28: Bandho ca nāma sadda,tthā, sahitā dosavajjitā;
anya-e0811n0:29: Pajja gajja vimissānaṃ, bhedenā’yaṃ tidhā bhave.
anya-e0811n0:31: Nibandho cā’nibandho ca, puna dvidhā niruppate;
anya-e0811n0:34: Anavajjaṃ mukhambhoja “ambhoja”nti padaṃ pāḷiyaṃ natthi, vārijavācakaṃ, sakkaṭaganthato anītaṃ, manavajjā ca bhāratī;
anya-e0811n0:35: Alaṅkatā’va sobhante, kiṃ nu te nira’laṅkatā?
anya-e0811n0:38: Sampāpuṇe na viññūhi, hassabhāvaṃ kathaṃ nu so?
anya-e0811n0:47: Pasaṃsiyā na viññūhi, sā kaññā viya tādisī.
anya-e0811n0:50: Niddosā sabbathā sā’yaṃ, saguṇā na bhaveyya kiṃ?
anya-e0811n0:55: Pade vākye tadatthe ca, dosā ye vividhā matā;
anya-e0811n0:73: Adhippete yathā megho, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:75: Visesya madhikaṃ yenā, jhattha metaṃ bhave yathā;
anya-e0811n0:79: Kiliṭṭhaṃ taṃ yathā tāya, so’ya māliṅgyate piyā.
anya-e0811n0:88: Yamakaṃ tañca pādāna, mādi, majjha, nta, gocaraṃ.
anya-e0811n0:99: Sādaraṃ sā daraṃ hantu, vihitā vihitā mayā;
anya-e0811n0:104: Sugato sugato lokaṃ, sahitaṃ sa hitaṃ karaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:112: Yamakaṃ taṃ pahelī paheḷi (ka.) ca, nekantamadhurāni’ti;
anya-e0811n0:118: Ya dappatīta mānīya, vattabbaṃ neyya māhu taṃ;
anya-e0811n0:119: Yathā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti rattiyaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:121: Nedisaṃ bahu maññanti, sabbe sabbattha viññuno;
anya-e0811n0:124: Siyā visesanāpekkhaṃ, yaṃ taṃ patvā visesanaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:125: Sātthakaṃ taṃ yathā taṃ so, bhiyyo passati cakkhunā.
anya-e0811n0:127: Hīnaṃ kare visesyaṃ yaṃ, taṃ hīnatthaṃ bhave yathā;
anya-e0811n0:131: Yathā hi vande buddhassa, pādapaṅkeruhaṃ pi ca.
anya-e0811n0:134: Saddato atthato vuttaṃ, yattha bhiyyopi vuccati;
anya-e0811n0:135: Ta mekatthaṃ yathā’bhāti, vārido vārido ayaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:142: Kāpi paññā, kopi paguṇo, pakatīpi aho tava.
anya-e0811n0:151: Kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ, na kāmayasi kiṃnvi’daṃ?
anya-e0811n0:154: Tampi gāmmaṃ tya’bhimataṃ, yathā yābhavato piyā.
anya-e0811n0:156: Vuttesu sūcite ṭṭhāne, padacchedo bhave yati;
anya-e0811n0:157: Yaṃ tāya hīnaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, yatihīnanti sā pana.
anya-e0811n0:163: Taṃ name sirasā cāmi, karavaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ;
anya-e0811n0:164: Sakalāpi disā siñca, tiva soṇṇarasehi yo.
anya-e0811n0:166: Saro sandhimhi pubbanto, viya lope vibhattiyā;
anya-e0811n0:173: Name taṃ sirasā sabbo, pamā’tītaṃ tathāgataṃ;
anya-e0811n0:174: Yassa lokaggataṃ patta, sso’pamā na hi yujjati.
anya-e0811n0:176: Munindaṃ taṃ sadā vandā, mya’nantamati muttamaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:177: Yassa paññā ca mettā ca, nissīmāti vijambhati.
anya-e0811n0:181: Paṇamāmi jinaṃ taṃ pa, varaṃ varaguṇā’layaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:184: Khettaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, desaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:190: Gāviputto balibaddho, tiṇaṃ khādī pivī jalaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:192: Bandhe pharusatā yattha, taṃ bandhapharusaṃ yathā;
anya-e0811n0:193: Kharā khilā parikkhīṇā, khette khittaṃ phalatya’laṃ.
anya-e0811n0:201: Bhoga, saggādi, nibbāna, sādhanāni na saṃsayo.
anya-e0811n0:205: Mayekasmiṃ guṇā sabbe, yato samuditā ahuṃ.
anya-e0811n0:208: Yācito’haṃ kathaṃ nāma, na dajjāmya’pi jīvitaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:213: Vise siṅgimhi nadiyaṃ, roge rājakulamhi ca.
anya-e0811n0:219: Vākyatthato duppatīti, karaṃ gāmmaṃ mataṃ yathā;
anya-e0811n0:220: Poso vīriyavā so’yaṃ, paraṃ hantvā na vissamī.
anya-e0811n0:242: Taṃ kathaṃ nāma megho’yaṃ, visado sukhaye janaṃ?
anya-e0811n0:246: Paṇītopi rasā’peto, cittā me sāmi te gati.
anya-e0811n0:252: Pahelikāya paheḷikāya (ka.) māruḷhā, na hi duṭṭhā kiliṭṭhatā;
anya-e0811n0:253: Piyā sukhā’liṅgitaṃ ka, māliṅgati nu no iti.
anya-e0811n0:256: Tato yamaka maññaṃ tu, sabba metaṃmayaṃ viya.
anya-e0811n0:268: Tantissara virodho so, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ?
anya-e0811n0:284: Imā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti nibbharaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:306: Sappo sappo! Ayaṃ handa, nivattatu bhavaṃ tato,
anya-e0811n0:325: Dunoti kāmacaṇḍālo, so maṃ sadaya niddayo;
anya-e0811n0:329: Yato na savanu’bbegaṃ, heṭṭhā yesaṃ vicāritaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:333: Desaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, khettaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:355: Nibbāna, bhoga, saggādi, sādhanāni na saṃsayo.
anya-e0811n0:367: Ocityaṃ nāma viññeyyaṃ, loke vikhyāta mādarā;
anya-e0811n0:376: Tiṇāyapi na maññittha, so vo detu jayaṃ jino.
anya-e0811n0:387: Pasāda mācare niccaṃ, sajjane saguṇepi ca.
anya-e0811n0:417: Dassessaṃ te tato dāni, sadde sambhūsayanti ye.
anya-e0811n0:438: Muninda manda sañjāta, hāsa candana limpitā;
anya-e0811n0:442: Yaṃ pāriṇatyaṃ hotī’ha, sopi ojo’va taṃ yathā.
anya-e0811n0:448: Yato puññena te sentu, jina pāda’mbujadvaye.
anya-e0811n0:454: Siyā samasuti pubbā, vaṇṇā’vutti paro yathā.
anya-e0811n0:457: Tadā pabhuti dhammassa, loke jāto mahu’ssavo.
anya-e0811n0:465: Mudūhi vā kevalehi, kevalehi phuṭehi vā,
anya-e0811n0:466: Missehi vā tidhā hoti, vaṇṇehi samatā yathā.
anya-e0811n0:470: Hadayaṅgamataṃ yāti, sataṃ deti ca nibbutiṃ.
anya-e0811n0:484: Caranti sādhū sādhu (sī-chandhānurakkhaṇatthaṃ) sambuddha, kāle keḷiparammukhā.
anya-e0811n0:496: Sabandhagāravo so’yaṃ, sileso nāma taṃ yathā.
anya-e0811n0:504: Pādambhoja rajo litta, gattā ye tava gotama;
anya-e0811n0:505: Aho! Te jantavo yanti, sabbathā nirajattanaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:510: Udāro sopi viññeyyo, yaṃ pasattha visesanaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:533: Apāṇe pāṇīnaṃ dhammo, sammā ādhīyate kvaci,;
anya-e0811n0:541: Uṇṇā puṇṇi’ndunā nātha! Divāpi saha saṅgamā;
anya-e0811n0:549: Madhurepi guṇe dhīra, na’ppasīdanti ye tava;
anya-e0811n0:554: Disā samantā dhāvanti, kundasobhā sa lakkhaṇā.
anya-e0811n0:566: Atisundara maññaṃ tu, kāmaṃ vindati gāmmataṃ.
anya-e0811n0:575: Bhāsanto madhuraṃ dhammaṃ, kaṃ na sappīṇaye janaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:587: Accantakantā kantā yato accantakantā (ka.) va vuccante te tato’dhunā.
anya-e0811n0:593: Līlā vikanti subhago, disā thira vilokano;
anya-e0811n0:611: Parivutti, bbhamo, bhāvo, missa, māsī, rasī, iti.
anya-e0811n0:613: Ete bhedā samuddiṭṭhā, bhāvo jīvita muccate;
anya-e0811n0:614: Vaṅkavuttīsu posesi, sileso tu siriṃ paraṃ.
anya-e0811n0:625: Nā’laṃ hantuṃ jine’saṃ tvaṃ, taṇhaṃ taṇhāharopi kiṃ?
anya-e0811n0:628: Sadda, tthagammā, vākyattha, visayā,ti ca sā bhidhā.
anya-e0811n0:630: Samāsa, paccaye, vā’dī, saddā tesaṃ vasā tidhā;
anya-e0811n0:636: Ivādī iva, vā, tulya, samāna, nibha, sannibhā;
anya-e0811n0:639: Sarī, sarikkha, saṃvādī, virodhi, sadisā, viya;
anya-e0811n0:643: Savaṇṇā, bhā, paṭinidhi, sadhammā, di salakkhaṇā.
anya-e0811n0:648: Tassa coreti sobhaggaṃ, tassa kantiṃ vilumpati;
anya-e0811n0:651: Kacchaṃ vigāhate, tassa, ta manvetya, nubandhati;
anya-e0811n0:675: Khayī cando, bahurajaṃ, padumaṃ, tehi te mukhaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:688: Samāsa, ppaccaye, vādi, saddayogaṃ vinā api.
anya-e0811n0:714: Uddhaṃ samuggatassā’pi, kiṃ te canda vijambhanā.
anya-e0811n0:719: Haṃsī’vā’yaṃ sasī bhinna, liṅgā, kāsaṃ sarāni’va;
anya-e0811n0:720: Vijāti vacanā, hīnā, sā’va bhatto bhaṭo’dhipe.
anya-e0811n0:729: Karonti cā’daraṃ dhīrā, payoge kvaci de’va tu.
anya-e0811n0:732: Piyo pāṇā ivā’yaṃ me, vijjā dhana’miva’ccitā.
anya-e0811n0:740: Asesa vatthu visayaṃ, ekadesa vivutti vivatti (ṭīkā), ca;
anya-e0811n0:741: Taṃ dvidhā puna paccekaṃ, samāsādivasā tidhā.
anya-e0811n0:745: Sirasā na pilandhanti, ke muninda pada’mbujaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:748: Ratanāni guṇā bhūrī, karuṇā sītalaṃ jalaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:760: Sukhaṃ ke vā na vindanti, passantā munino mukhaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:770: Rūpakāni bahūnye’va ṭīkāyaṃ uddhaṭaṃ yuttarūpakaṃ sitapupphujalaṃ lola, nettabhiṅga tavā’nanaṃ; kassa nāma mano dhīra, nākaḍḍhati manoharaṃ;, yuttā, yuttādibhedato;
anya-e0811n0:777: Natthi yaṃ tena viññeyyaṃ, avutta manumānato.
anya-e0811n0:779: Punappuna muccāraṇaṃ punappunuccāraṇaṃ yaṃ, yamatthassa, padassa ca;
anya-e0811n0:783: Mano harati sabbesaṃ, ādadāti disā dasa;
anya-e0811n0:788: Vibhā senti ca sabbāpi, candādīnaṃ hatā viya.
anya-e0811n0:791: Jitvā viharati klesa, ripuṃ loke jino ayaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:795: Dīpakaṃ nāma taṃ cādi, majjha, ntavisayaṃ tidhā.
anya-e0811n0:807: Jinā’nani’ndu indu ca, kassa nā’nandako bhave.
anya-e0811n0:811: Taṃ pītihetu, sā cā’yaṃ, passaddhyā’di pasiddhiyā.
anya-e0811n0:822: Ekākī’ nekasenaṃ taṃ, māraṃ sa vijayī jino;
anya-e0811n0:823: Kathaṃ ta mathavā tassa, pāramībala mīdisaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:827: Paṇāmo nanu so ye’va, sakimpi sugate gato.
anya-e0811n0:830: Saccaṃ na te gamissanti, sivaṃ sujanagocaraṃ;
anya-e0811n0:831: Micchādiṭṭhi parikkanta parikanta (ka.), mānasā ye sudujjanā.
anya-e0811n0:838: Tepi lokahitā sattā, sūriyo candimā api;
anya-e0811n0:839: Atthaṃ passa gamissanti, niyamo kena laṅghyate.
anya-e0811n0:843: Gato’va nibbutiṃ sabbe, saṅkhārā na hi sassatā.
anya-e0811n0:846: Jino saṃsārakantārā, janaṃ pāpeti pāpesi (ka.) nibbutiṃ;
anya-e0811n0:847: Nanu yuttā gati sā’yaṃ, vesārajja samaṅginaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:851: Sayaṃ rāgaparītā hi, pare rañjenti saṅgate.
anya-e0811n0:853: Vācce gamme tha vatthūnaṃ, sadisatte pabhedanaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:858: Tulyo tva masi bhedo tu, sarīrene’disena te.
anya-e0811n0:880: Na hoti khalu dujjanya, mapi dujjanasaṅgame;
anya-e0811n0:883: Janako, ñāpako ceti, duvidhā hetavo siyuṃ;
anya-e0811n0:890: Munino desanā’yaṃ me, kāmaṃ toseti mānasaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:912: Ālāpa hāsa līḷāhi, muninda! Vijayā tava;
anya-e0811n0:913: Kokilā kumudāni co, pasevante vanaṃ jalaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:918: Pītiyā me samuppannā, santa! Sandassanā tava;
anya-e0811n0:919: Kālenā’yaṃ bhave pīti, tave’va puna dassanā.
anya-e0811n0:946: Vasaṃ nenti’va dhīraṃ taṃ, tadā yogā’bhiyogato.
anya-e0811n0:953: Muninda! Pādadvande te, cāru rājiva sundare;
anya-e0811n0:956: Maññe, saṅke, dhuvaṃ, nūna, miva, micceva mādihi;
anya-e0811n0:957: Sā’yaṃ byañjīyate kvā’pi, kvā’pi vākyena gamyate.
anya-e0811n0:961: Pīṇentā jina! Te sādhu, janaṃ sarasataṃ nayuṃ.
anya-e0811n0:975: Thutiṃ karoti nindanto, viya taṃ byājavaṇṇanaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:976: Dosā’bhāsā guṇā eva, yanti sannidhi matra hi.
anya-e0811n0:979: Visesaṃ tāvatā nātha!, Guṇānaṃ te vadāma kiṃ?
anya-e0811n0:981: Visesi’cchāyaṃ dabbassa, kriyā, jāti, guṇassa ca;
anya-e0811n0:982: Vekalladassanaṃ yatra, viseso nāma yaṃ bhave.
anya-e0811n0:984: Na rathā, na ca mātaṅgā, na hayā, na padātayo;
anya-e0811n0:988: Na baddhā bhūkuṭi, neva, phurito dasanacchado;
anya-e0811n0:989: Mārāribhaṅgaṃ cā’kāsi, muni vīro varo sayaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:997: Na kharaṃ, na hi vā thaddhaṃ, muninda! Vacanaṃ tava;
anya-e0811n0:1005: Puttā me pādasambhattā, sajjā sante’va tādise.
anya-e0811n0:1019: Sugato visadaṃ pātu, pāṇinaṃ so vināyako.
anya-e0811n0:1022: Viruddhā, viruddhā, bhinna, kammā, niyamavā, paro;
anya-e0811n0:1025: Ocitya samposakādi, sileso, padajā’di padajāti (ka.) pi;
anya-e0811n0:1034: Suṇanti vācaṃ munino, janā passanti cā’mataṃ.
anya-e0811n0:1038: Mano pīṇeti jantūnaṃ, jino vācāya bhāya ca.
anya-e0811n0:1056: Sadayo pya’dayo pāpe, cittā’yaṃ munino gati.
anya-e0811n0:1063: Saṃkittanaṃ bhavati yaṃ, sā matā tulyayogitā.
anya-e0811n0:1066: Ubhohi raṃsimālī ca, bhagavā ca tamonudo.
anya-e0811n0:1068: Atthantaraṃ sādhayatā, kiñci taṃ sadisaṃ phalaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:1069: Dassīyate asantaṃ vā, santaṃ vā taṃ nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:1084: Purā paraṃ siriṃ vindi, bodhisatto’ bhinikkhamā.
anya-e0811n0:1087: Satto sambodhiyaṃ bodhi, satto sattahitāya so;
anya-e0811n0:1090: Gopetvā vaṇṇanīyaṃ yaṃ, kiñci dassīyate paraṃ;
anya-e0811n0:1091: Asamaṃ vā samaṃ tassa, yadi sā vañcanā matā.
anya-e0811n0:1094: Purato na sahassesu, na pañcesu ca tādino;
anya-e0811n0:1099: Sampuṇṇo candimā nā’yaṃ, chatta metaṃ manobhuno.
anya-e0811n0:1108: Siyā ekāvali sā’yaṃ, dvidhā vidhi, nisedhato.
anya-e0811n0:1111: Pādā nakhāli rucirā, nakhāli raṃsi bhāsurā;
anya-e0811n0:1117: Nā’layo yo sa jantūnaṃ, nā’nanta byasanā vaho.
anya-e0811n0:1119: Yahiṃ bhūsiya bhūsattaṃ, aññamaññaṃ tu vatthunaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:1123: Mahantiṃ vindatī kantiṃ, sopi teneva tādisiṃ.
anya-e0811n0:1125: Kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa, kriyāya ca, guṇassa ca;
anya-e0811n0:1129: Jalanti candaraṃsīhi, samaṃ satthu nakhaṃ savo;
anya-e0811n0:1134: Pāpaṃ disā suvimalā, saha sajjana cetasā.
anya-e0811n0:1139: Guṇā sabhāva madhurā, api loke’ka bandhuno;
anya-e0811n0:1142: Yassa kassa ci dānena, yassa kassa ci vatthuno;
anya-e0811n0:1146: Muninā samanuppattā, dāni sabbaññutāsirī muninda! samanuppatto, dāni sabbaññutāsiriṃ (ka.).
anya-e0811n0:1149: Saṃsayā’pagataṃ vatthuṃ, yattha so’yaṃ bhamo mato.
anya-e0811n0:1155: Yena kenaci vaṇṇena, bhāvo nāmā’ya mīrito.
anya-e0811n0:1157: Nanu teye’va santāno, sāgarā na kulācalā;
anya-e0811n0:1158: Manampi mariyādaṃ ye, saṃvaṭṭepi jahanti no.
anya-e0811n0:1160: Aṅgaṅgi bhāvā sadisa, balabhāvā ca bandhane;
anya-e0811n0:1164: Pasatthā munino pāda, nakha raṃsi mahānadī;
anya-e0811n0:1165: Aho! Gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi, sukhayatye’va te jane.
anya-e0811n0:1168: Veso sabhāva madhuro, rūpaṃ netta rasāyanaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:1169: Madhū’va munino vācā, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:1186: Ko nāma passitu malaṃ khalu tāsa mantaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:1199: Citta vutti visesā tu, bhāvayanti rase yato;
anya-e0811n0:1209: Jigucchā, vimhayo, ceva, samo ca nava ṭhāyino.
anya-e0811n0:1213: Ye te caranti sīlena, te honti byabhicārino.
anya-e0811n0:1227: Sattikā sātvikā (ka.) pya’nubhāvatte, visuṃ bhāvā bhavanti te.
anya-e0811n0:1230: Thambho, paḷaya, romañcā, tathā seda, ssu, vepathu;
anya-e0811n0:1233: Yadā ratyādayo bhāvā, ṭhitisīlā na honti ce;
anya-e0811n0:1234: Tadā sabbepi te bhāvā, bhavanti byabhicārino.
anya-e0811n0:1255: Assādiyatta mānīya, māno ṭhāye’va so raso.
anya-e0811n0:1268: Yutyā bhāvānubhāvā te, nibandhā posayanti naṃ;
anya-e0811n0:1283: Jeṭṭhe majjhe’dhameti ettha majjhe adhameti padacchedo majjhe’dhame ca kamaso.
